Texts.Chs: 找到^orange;其他品种的蜜蜂^white;，然后让它们杂交。你肯定想不到最后会得到什么！我建议你尽快找到^green;森林蜜蜂^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Find ^green;other types of bees^reset;, and cross-breed them within. You never know what you'll end up with! I suggest searching for ^green;Forest Bees^reset; as soon as possible!

Texts.Chs: 现在你需要抓到^orange;蜂后和工蜂^white;并放进蜂箱，你可能会用到^orange;捕虫网^reset;。蜜蜂在大多数星球都有，活动时间通常在白天。
Texts.Eng: Now you need to ^green;catch a queen and a drone honey bee^reset; and let them loose inside your apiary. You'll need a ^orange;Bug Net^reset; for this. Bees can be found on most biomes, usually during the daylight hours.
